etymology.description: 信 + 義 + 區 = district named for “faith and righteousness.”
etymology.interpretation: Administrative district of Taipei whose name uses the virtue binome 信義, evoking trust and righteousness. Often associated with modern commercial landmarks like Taipei 101.
etymology.simplification: Mainland simplification reduced strokes: 義 → 义 and 區 → 区; 信 unchanged. Taiwan uses traditional 信義區 as the official form.

examples.chinese: 我们今天去台北的信义区参观(我們今天去臺北的信義區參觀)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen jīntiān qù Táiběi de Xìnyì Qū cānguān.
examples.english: We’re going to Taipei’s Xinyi District today to visit.

examples.chinese: 信义区位于台北市东部，是重要的商业中心(信義區位於臺北市東部，是重要的商業中心)。
examples.pinyin: Xìnyì Qū wèiyú Táiběi Shì dōngbù, shì zhòngyào de shāngyè zhōngxīn.
examples.english: Xinyi District is in eastern Taipei and is an important commercial center.

examples.chinese: 许多游客来这里购物并参观台北101(許多遊客來這裡購物並參觀臺北101)。
examples.pinyin: Xǔduō yóukè lái zhèlǐ gòuwù bìng cānguān Táiběi yī líng yī.
examples.english: Many tourists come here to shop and visit Taipei 101.
